author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Fennec Pharmaceuticals Receives Breakthrough Therapy Designation By FDA For Pedmark™
text:
March 27 (Reuters) - Fennec Pharmaceuticals Inc:
* FENNEC PHARMACEUTICALS RECEIVES BREAKTHROUGH THERAPY DESIGNATION BY FDA FOR PEDMARK™
* FENNEC PHARMACEUTICALS INC - ‍FDA GRANTED PEDMARK BREAKTHROUGH THERAPY DESIGNATION FOR PREVENTION OF CISPLATIN-RELATED OTOTOXICITY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
